posts.post_content:
Frank's Pizzeria is open for business.  This week's special is a three topping pizza.
Have it your way, pick your own toppings.  The prices below include shipping.
Don't wait.  Next week's offering could be different, two topping pizzas, additional toppings, even anchovies may be offered.  You never know.

#1 - TANNEHILL
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10583/tannehill-sov[/IMG]

#2 - WILTSE
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10329/wiltse-portrait[/IMG]

#3 - CLARKE
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10305/clarke-j-j[/IMG]

#4 - HALL
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10254/hall[/IMG]

#5 - REULBACH
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10863/reulbach-glove[/IMG]

#6 - DEMMIT
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/47874/demmitt-ny[/IMG]

Their is an advantage in being the first to order as all the toppings may be added only once.  Ironically once the first pizza (out of 20) is sold, only one will remain.

therefore 20 - 1 = 1  (but you knew that already)

For those of you who have never ordered a pizza, let's say you want Clarke, Wiltse & Demmit.  That would be Pizza #236 and on the menu you would find the price of $114 shipped.

Frank-
You are always the best at BST. 
I have those already, but I love pizza... so here I am with a conundrum

I can't believe he didn't eat the whole thing, but overnight someone tampered with pizza #356.  The Reulbach topping with Glove has mysteriously disappeared from the pie.

That leaves me with a measly two topping #36.

If you are interested in this remaining pizza, I will sell it as is for $74 shipped.

If you want three toppings though, I will even throw in a random card, and I do mean random, for no additional cost.
